Class Analyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardPickup.Analyzer

  • public class Analyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates stats and performance of Defenders and Attackers

        java.lang.String[] aNames,
        java.lang.String[] dNames)
        Calculates important values for comparing attackers and defenders
        Parameters:
        results - point value 2dArray with row as defenders and columns as attackers
        aNames - the names of the attackers as they are in the results
        dNames - the names of the defenders as they are in the results
